channel.title: Pvp Zones - Spawning In wilderness?
channel.description: Hey, can someone please help me I need to know how to make the whole of my server Pvp zone apart from in Banks etc, Also I also need to know how to stop people being able to spawn In wilderness. Thanks a lot :D

item.title: Pvp Zones - Spawning In wilderness?
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

There will most likely be a boolean called inWilderness or something like that, but if you wanna make it all pvp, it’d be better to make one called inSafeZone or something like that…
If you wanna be spoonfed, you should provide revision, base, etc.

Read full topic
